glsa.title: Gajim: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Gajim might allow remote attackers to intercept encrypted communications.

background.p: Gajim is a Jabber/XMPP client which uses GTK+.

description.p: Gajim unconditionally implements the “XEP-0146: Remote Controlling Clients” extension.

impact.p: Remote attackers, by enticing a user to connect to a malicious XMPP server, could extract plaintext from Off The Record (OTR) encrypted sessions.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Gajim users should upgrade to the latest version:
